author: vs:ez.no
msg: - Added portable way of handling temporary tables.
- Added ability for the database handlers to report features they support
- Added getName() function to the handler interface that allows user to know
which DBMS he/she is working with.
- It is now possible to throw ezcDbException with arbitrary error message.

author: vs:ez.no
msg: - It is now possible to execute a query passing it either as

msg: - Sending multipart mails with attachments works
